Thank you for choosing\nFollow the Money!

In Follow the Money, you can keep track of all your expenses!
From the main page, tap "Add Expense" to create a new expense. You need to choose a category, specify a date and the amount spent, but you can leave the note empty!
After adding a few expenses, tap "View Expenses" from the main page to view all the expenses you created! In addition, tapping an existing expense will allow you to edit its details, and long-tapping it will remove it from the list.
Lastly, you can see a summary of all of your expenses by tapping "Expenses Summary" in the main page.
